description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物、律师，德国社会民主党成员。曾于2021年至2025年担任德意志联邦共和国总理。
description.en: German politician and lawyer, member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. Served as Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany from 2021 to 2025.

description.zh-cn: 德国社会民主党政治人物，奥拉夫·朔尔茨的妻子。
description.en: German politician of the Social Democratic Party and wife of Olaf Scholz.

description.zh-cn: 奥拉夫·朔尔茨的二弟。
description.en: The second younger brother of Olaf Scholz.

description.zh-cn: 奥拉夫·朔尔茨的三弟。
description.en: The third younger brother of Olaf Scholz.

description.zh-cn: 德国的一个社会民主主义政党，是德国现存最古老的政党。
description.en: A social democratic political party in Germany, and the oldest existing political party in Germany.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，曾任德国总理和德国社会民主党领袖。
description.en: German politician who served as Chancellor of Germany and leader of the Social Democratic Party of Germany.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，于2005年至2021年担任德国总理。
description.en: German politician who served as Chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021.

description.zh-cn: 德意志联邦共和国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of the Federal Republic of Germany.

description.zh-cn: 由德国社会民主党、联盟90/绿党和自由民主党组成的德国联合政府。
description.en: The coalition government of Germany, formed by the Social Democratic Party, Alliance 90/The Greens, and the Free Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，自由民主党领袖，曾在萧兹内阁中担任财政部长。
description.en: German politician, leader of the Free Democratic Party, who served as Minister of Finance in the Scholz cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 因财政预算分歧，德国总理朔尔茨解除了财长林德纳的职务，导致自由民主党退出执政联盟，引发联合政府解体。
description.en: Triggered by disagreements over the budget, German Chancellor Scholz dismissed Finance Minister Lindner, leading to the withdrawal of the Free Democratic Party from the ruling coalition and the collapse of the government.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治人物，德国基督教民主联盟领袖，于2025年接替朔尔茨成为德国总理。
description.en: German politician, leader of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, who succeeded Scholz as Chancellor of Germany in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 德国总理奥拉夫·朔尔茨在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后发表的演讲，宣布德国军事和外交政策的根本性转变。
description.en: A speech given by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz following the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, announcing a fundamental shift in German military and foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的全面军事入侵，是2014年开始的俄乌战争的重大升级。
description.en: A full-scale military invasion of Ukraine by Russia, representing a major escalation of the Russo-Ukrainian War that began in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who is the current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在社民党领袖格哈特·施罗德任职期间，朔尔茨担任该党总书记。
description.en: Scholz served as SPD General Secretary while Gerhard Schröder was the party leader.

position.zh-cn: 联邦劳动及社会事务部部长、联邦副总理兼财政部长
position.en: Minister of Labour and Social Affairs, Vice Chancellor and Minister of Finance

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨在默克尔总理领导的内阁中先后担任过两个不同时期的部长级职务。
description.en: Scholz held ministerial positions in two different periods under Chancellor Angela Merkel's cabinets.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨领导社民党与绿党、自由民主党达成联合执政协议，组建了“红绿灯联盟”政府。
description.en: Scholz led the SPD to form a coalition agreement with the Greens and the FDP, creating the 'traffic light coalition' government.

description.zh-cn: 因2025年财政预算案存在分歧，朔尔茨解除了林德纳的财政部长职务。
description.en: Due to disagreements over the 2025 budget, Scholz dismissed Lindner from his position as Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨解除财长林德纳职务的决定，直接触发了自由民主党退出执政联盟，导致联合政府解体。
description.en: Scholz's decision to dismiss Finance Minister Lindner directly triggered the FDP's withdrawal from the ruling coalition, causing the collapse of the government.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·默茨于2025年5月6日接替朔尔茨成为德国总理。
description.en: Friedrich Merz succeeded Scholz as Chancellor of Germany on May 6, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯对乌克兰的入侵是朔尔茨发表“时代转折演讲”的直接原因，该演讲标志着德国国防和外交政策的重大转变。
description.en: Russia's invasion of Ukraine was the direct cause for Scholz's 'Zeitenwende speech', which marked a major shift in German defense and foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨在德国联邦议院发表了“时代转折”演讲，宣布增加国防开支并向乌克兰提供武器。
description.en: Scholz delivered the 'Zeitenwende speech' in the Bundestag, announcing increased defense spending and arms supplies to Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨应时任中国国务院总理李克强的邀请，对中国进行正式访问。
description.en: Scholz paid an official visit to China at the invitation of then-Premier of the State Council of China, Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨在担任总理期间两次访问中国，并与中国国家主席习近平举行会晤。
description.en: During his chancellorship, Scholz visited China twice and met with Chinese President Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 朔尔茨应中国国务院总理李强的邀请，于2024年4月对中国进行访问。
description.en: Scholz visited China in April 2024 at the invitation of Chinese Premier Li Qiang.
